10/10 Classic.
Honestly, this is my favorite game I have every played. Some days, I love it and other days I fucking hate it, but I always end up getting back on the next day....
If you want to have fun with your friends, just download this game ;)

[h1]My short CS:GO review.[/h1]
CS:GO is a pretty fun game when you play it with the [b]right people[/b], I.E your friends. Competitive is pretty good apart from when you get a really toxic team. If you want to have the most fun though you need to buy prime upgrade to get away from most the cheaters. Over all its a pretty fun game if you get in with the right people and don't get too mad at losing. [strike](like me)[/strike]

Pretty good game. Volvo has been kinda doing a good job with it right now, but there is still several glaring issues. 

Pro Tip: don't go into competitive as soon as you can, get familiar with the guns when you play casual or deathmatch or something first. Also don't move while your shooting rifles for gods sake
